text: When I think about E2 or when I think about just kind of the general upper intermediate level of any language as a language learner, I think of that level as the point when I can start to feel kind of comfortable in the language in the sense that I can operate in the language. I can maybe even live in that country and be okay. And obviously I'm going to have plenty of errors.
